page.title: 16The Plough, Longdon
page.content: The village{ pub }is a conveniently situated venue for the {Tewkesbury {and District Motor-cycle Club,}formed in 1970 for those having a common interest in motor-cycles. The 80 or so members come from the Tewkesbury, Gloucester and Worcester areas, meeting each Thursday evening. They attend{rallies}and compete for {prizes for best turned-out club}and {best machine.}Camping week-ends, both at home and abroad, and discos are organised for members and their families. The club members {raise funds }for {local charities.}The most{recent event was in October 1985, when they held a {sponsored ride}on a 6-seater push-bike over a 78-mile route in 2 days. They expect the donation to the{ Tewkesbury {Hospital}will be about{Â£1000.
